title: How can I make my command line app interactive?
author: t2_3u5wxag5
text:
Hello r/learnpython

I am planning to make a text editor as my first big project and I was thinking, lets say I opened a text file in the command line, how can I make the courser (the blinking dash, sorry my english sucks :) ) move through the text so I can delete a word or add something somewhere etc... I have never seen a tutorial that mentions such terminals even though they are quite common in githup projects.  


Thanks in advance.

comments.author: kyber
comments.body:
Might find looking at a Python TUI helpful:
